documentation.purpose:
This rule is to populate Powerform date/times based off of Surginet date/times. SCIP Inf-1 is a National Hospital Quality Measure which evaluates patients receiving antibiotics withinin one hour prior to their surgery. The risk of infection increased progressively with greater time intervals between administration and skin incision. Patients who received vancomycin for a prophylactic antibiotic should have the antibiotic administered within two hours prior to surgical incision. Due to the longer infusion time required for vancomycin it is acceptable to start this antibiotic within two hours prior to incision time.
OP-6 is the Hospital Outpatient Surgery measure set which also evaluates patients receiving antibiotics within one hour prior to surgery
documentation.explanation: The current use of this rule is to populate surgery begin and end times for Surgical patients as well as ICU patients for the Core Measures.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_TREND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: NUM_TO_QUALIFY out of the NUM_TO_EVAL most recent results for EVENT_SET_NAME are EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_DATE_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, EVENT_NAME using ANCHOR_DT, offset OPT_OFFSET_DAY days, OPT_OFFSET_HOUR hours and OPT_OFFSET_MIN minutes on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

customValue.value: SN - CTm - Set Up - Start Time

values.value: SN - CTm - Set Up - Start Time

value.value: select into "nl:" from clinical_event ce, ce_date_result cdr plan ce where ce.clinical_event_id = @CLINICALEVENTID:3:2 join cdr where cdr.event_id = ce.event_id detail call echo(build("cdr.result_dt_tm ==", format(cdr.result_dt_tm,";;q"))) ekssub->mod = format(cdr.result_dt_tm,"DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS;;d") with nocounter go

select into "nl:" from clinical_event ce, ce_date_result cdr plan ce where ce.clinical_event_id = @CLINICALEVENTID:5 join cdr where cdr.event_id = ce.event_id detail call echo(build("cdr.result_dt_tm ==", format(cdr.result_dt_tm,";;q"))) ekssub->mod = format(cdr.result_dt_tm,"DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS;;d") with nocounter go

select into "nl:" from clinical_event ce, ce_date_result cdr plan ce where ce.clinical_event_id = @CLINICALEVENTID:8:2 join cdr where cdr.event_id = ce.event_id detail call echo(build("cdr.result_dt_tm ==", format(cdr.result_dt_tm,";;q"))) ekssub->mod = format(cdr.result_dt_tm,"DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS;;d") with nocounter go

select into "nl:" from clinical_event ce, ce_date_result cdr plan ce where ce.clinical_event_id = @CLINICALEVENTID:10 join cdr where cdr.event_id = ce.event_id detail call echo(build("cdr.result_dt_tm ==", format(cdr.result_dt_tm,";;q"))) ekssub->mod = format(cdr.result_dt_tm,"DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS;;d") with nocounter go
